mapper.select: select * from onechoice where one_text = #{text} and source_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into onechoice (one_id, one_text, one_A, one_B, one_C, one_D, one_E, one_F, one_answer, one_parse, one_level, source_id) values (#{oneId}, #{oneText}, #{oneA}, #{oneB}, #{oneC}, #{oneD}, #{oneE}, #{oneF}, #{oneAnswer}, #{oneParse}, #{oneLevel}, #{sourceId})
